fields.name: pubkey
fields.description: Pubkey of account to query, as a base-58 encoded string.

fields.name: commitment
fields.description: Commitment level for the query. finalized | confirmed | processed

fields.name: encoding
fields.description: Encoding format for account data. base58 | base64 | base64+zstd | jsonParsed

fields.name: dataSlice
fields.description: Request a slice of the account's data.

fields.name: dataSlice.offset
fields.description: Byte offset from which to start reading.

fields.name: dataSlice.length
fields.description: Number of bytes to return.

fields.name: minContextSlot
fields.description: The minimum slot that the request can be evaluated at.

fields.name: changedSinceSlot
fields.description: Only return the account if it has been modified at or after this slot number. If unchanged since that slot, response can include status: unchanged.

errors.description: Bad Request - Invalid request parameters or malformed request.

fields.description: Number of bytes to return.

fields.name: encoding
fields.description: Encoding format for the returned account data. jsonParsed | base58 | base64 | base64+zstd

fields.name: changedSinceSlot
fields.description: Only return accounts that have been modified at or after this slot number. For accounts that exist but haven't changed since the specified slot, the response will contain status as unchanged.

errors.description: Bad Request - Invalid request parameters or malformed request.

data.additionalInfo: Please check the request parameters and ensure they are valid.

errors.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

data.additionalInfo: Please verify your API key and try again.

errors.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded.

data.additionalInfo: You have exceeded the allowed number of requests. Please wait and try again later.

errors.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server.

data.additionalInfo: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please try again later or contact support.

errors.description: Service Unavailable - The service is temporarily unavailable.

data.additionalInfo: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later or contact support.

errors.description: Gateway Timeout - The request timed out.

data.additionalInfo: The request timed out. Please try again later or contact support.

fields.description: Maximum number of transaction signatures to return in a single request (1-1,000).

fields.name: before
fields.description: Pagination parameter to get transactions before this signature (earlier in time).

fields.name: until
fields.description: Get transactions until this signature is reached, useful for specific time ranges.

fields.name: transaction
fields.description: The fully-signed Solana transaction encoded as a base-58 string for blockchain submission.

fields.name: encoding
fields.description: Data encoding format used for the Solana transaction payload. base58 | base64

fields.name: skipPreflight
fields.description: When true, bypasses Solana's preflight transaction validation for faster submission.

fields.name: preflightCommitment
fields.description: Solana network commitment level for transaction validation checks. confirmed | finalized | processed

fields.name: maxRetries
fields.description: Maximum number of automatic retry attempts for failed Solana transaction submissions.

fields.name: minContextSlot
fields.description: Minimum Solana blockchain slot required for transaction processing.

fields.name: transaction
fields.description: The signed transaction, as an encoded string (base58 or base64).

fields.name: encoding
fields.description: Encoding used for the transaction data. base58 | base64

fields.name: skipPreflight
fields.description: Skip the preflight transaction checks.

fields.name: preflightCommitment
fields.description: Commitment level to use for preflight. confirmed | finalized | processed

fields.name: sigVerify
fields.description: If true, verify the transaction signatures.

fields.name: replaceRecentBlockhash
fields.description: If true, replace the transaction recent blockhash with the most recent one.

fields.name: minContextSlot
fields.description: Minimum slot at which to perform preflight transaction checks.

fields.name: innerInstructions
fields.description: If true, include inner instructions in the response.

fields.name: accounts
fields.description: Configuration for returning account data.

fields.name: accounts.addresses
fields.description: Array of accounts to return, as base-58 encoded strings.

fields.name: accounts.encoding
fields.description: Encoding format for returned account data. base64 | base58 | base64+zstd | jsonParsed
